caption: This is a wonderful epic series clip. The background of it is in middle age. Two men are walking in a garden, with one being a tall, slender man dressed in black, and the other being an older and slightly overweight man. They are discussing something. In this garden, there are people working in the fields, some are weaving clothes, but it seems that these people have some issues. Then, one of the men later visits a place that appears to be a blacksmith's shop. He asks the blacksmith about something, and the blacksmith responds with some information but refuses something as well. The people accompanying the man appear quite angry, but the man stops his followers.Afterward, in another location, two men are in conversation. A woman rushes out of the house, holding some clothes, and one of the men requests forgiveness from the other. The other man doesn't appear to blame him.
